data.approach: Modify TaskCreationDrawer to: 1) Auto-expand project dropdown when drawer opens without a pre-selected project, 2) Disable form fields until project is selected, 3) Focus dropdown button when drawer opens. Changes to drawerStore.ts to track if opened via keyboard.

summary: Implemented focus behavior for project dropdown when opening new task drawer via Alt+N shortcut
Ensured project selection is mandatory before proceeding with task creation
Added user experience improvement to guide immediate project selection

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for New Task Drawer Project Selection Logic
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to validate the new project dropdown focus and mandatory selection behavior. Tests should cover scenarios like keyboard navigation, dropdown expansion, and preventing task creation without project selection. Focus on UI interaction component in the task creation module.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure robust implementation of new user interaction pattern

suggestedTasks.title: Document Keyboard Shortcut and Project Selection Requirement
suggestedTasks.description: Update user documentation to explain the new Alt+N shortcut behavior and the requirement to select a project before creating a task. Include details about the rationale behind forcing project selection and how it improves workflow organization.
suggestedTasks.reason: Clarify new user interface behavior and interaction guidelines

patterns: Enforce mandatory field selection before proceeding
gotchas: Ensure keyboard focus management is smooth and intuitive

documentationNeeds: Update user guide for task creation workflow
